Package com.example.sjsuwebsite

Class ItemSystem

java.lang.Object
com.example.sjsuwebsite.ItemSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Product, java.lang.Cloneable
public class ItemSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Product, java.lang.Cloneable
Component Design Able to merge Item and Bundle together into one long chain. Uses Composite Design Pattern
